Imports

config, timer

Types

CI[T] = object
  value*: T
  lower*, upper*: T

Estimates = object
  mean*: CI[float64]
  stddev*: CI[float64]
  slope*: CI[float64]
  rsquare*: CI[float64]

Outliers = tuple[extreme: int, mild: int]
Statistics = object
  label*: string
  samples*: seq[float64]
  cycleSamples*: seq[float64]
  iterations*: seq[int]
  samplesEst*: Estimates
  cycleSamplesEst*: Estimates
  outliers*: Outliers
  cycleOutliers*: Outliers
